text: Denmark competed at the 1980 Winter Paralympics in held in Geilo, Norway. Eight competitors (six men and two women) from Denmark did not win any medals and so finished last in the medal table. All athletes competed in cross- country skiing. == Cross-country == The following athletes represented Denmark: * Jens Bromann * Arne Christensen * Bent Christensen * Jorn Clausen * Else Hansen * Michael Hansen * Peder Hansen * Helene Helledi No medals were won. == See also == * Denmark at the Paralympics * Denmark at the 1980 Summer Paralympics == References == Category:Denmark at the Paralympics Category:1980 in Danish sport Category:Nations at the 1980 Winter Paralympics
title: Denmark at the 1980 Winter Paralympics
